answers.answer: Hi,Have you been drinking adequate amount of water everyday?Have you been frequently controlling urination ,or skipping it because you are too busy etc?Any intake of medications?Previous injury to the abdomen or groin area?Previous surgeries or nerve blocks?Any underlying nerve problems, diabetes?Do keep us posted with your answers.

question: i dont have the urge to urinate and sometimes i ca go for hours without urinating what could be wrong
title: no urge to urinate
